DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Studying protein expression sentinel lymph node tissue patient cancer laboratory may help doctor identify learn biomarkers related cancer . It may also help study cancer future . PURPOSE : This laboratory study evaluate OX-40 protein expression sentinel lymph node patient cancer .
DOC.brief_title: OX-40 Protein Expression Sentinel Lymph Nodes Patients With Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Determine qualitative quantitative expression OX-40 related marker sentinel lymph node previously remove patient cancer . - Determine qualitative quantitative expression OX-40 related marker sentinel lymph node freshly remove patient cancer . - Correlate expression OX-40 related marker sentinel lymph node tissue expression nonsentinel tissue primary tumor nonsentinel lymph node , tumor stage , patient outcome . OUTLINE : Sections primary tumor , nonsentinel lymph node , sentinel lymph node analyzed expression OX-40 immunohistochemistry . Sections negative ( tumor metastasis ) lymph node use internal control . Fresh tissue blood test marker analysis vitro assay immune function . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 100 specimen sentinel lymph node previously remove cancer patient 100 specimen sentinel lymph node freshly remove cancer patient accrue study .
